definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Two strap buckle closure ensures a secure fit.
sentences.chinese: 双背带扣封，确保安全的契合。

sentences.english: Shapes, smooths, supports and lifts with perfectly placed padding and comfortable straps.
sentences.chinese: 形状，平滑，支持和升降机最适合填充和舒适的背带。

sentences.english: Adjustable hook-and-loop closure strap keeps shoes secure.
sentences.chinese: 可调的钩环闭合背带保持鞋的安全。

sentences.english: But who was it coloured that little frock, my child.
sentences.chinese: 但那是谁帮你将背带裤染成彩色的，我的孩子？

sentences.english: Harnesses are also attached on the riders to allow for a safer travel experience.
sentences.chinese: 骑自行车的人也要系上背带，保证骑行时候的安全。

sentences.english: Rubber ID sleeve and strap sleeves.
The checkered pattern of that suspender recurred incessantly to his mind.
sentences.chinese: 那根背带的棋盘格花纹不停地在他脑子里显现出来。

sentences.english: Ask about features such as impact resistant windows and a greater number of roof truss straps.
sentences.chinese: 问起耐冲击等特点的视窗及更多屋架背带。

sentences.english: A bra's straps allow you to modify how the cups fit and support your breasts.
sentences.chinese: 胸罩背带使得你可以调整罩杯来适应和支撑你的胸部。

sentences.english: She found one, light pink with thin straps.
sentences.chinese: 她找到了一件浅粉色细背带的。

sentences.english: Your sling is flammable. Do not use it near open flames or other heat sources.
sentences.chinese: 你的背带是易燃物品，使用时请远离火种或其他火源。

sentences.english: The rocketbelt will always interest the public and amaze spectators.
sentences.chinese: 火箭背带会激起公众的兴趣，让观众大吃一惊。

sentences.english: Hiking with the baby-trage could make us walk much more faster.
sentences.chinese: 用婴儿背带徒步行可以让我们走得更快些。

sentences.english: Grandma's handbag, suspended by thick, black leather straps, hung down on her hip.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶的手提包有厚厚的黑色皮质背带，包挂于臀部处。

sentences.english: Elastic insets and smooth leather tabs at cross straps.
sentences.chinese: 在交叉弹性插入和光滑的皮革背带标签。

sentences.english: American footballers wear shoulder-pads for protection.
sentences.chinese: 把背带穿过取景器盖和肩垫。

definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
(of a garment) designed to be put on by pulling it over one's head (like a sweater or T-shirt etc)
